Quotes.quote: The best love is the kind that awakens the soul and makes us reach for more, that plants a fire in our hearts and brings peace to our minds.
Quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.quote: I love you without knowing how, or when, or from where. I love you simply, without problems or pride: I love you in this way because I do not know any other way of loving but this.
Quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

Quotes.quote: I look at you and see the rest of my life in front of my eyes.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: You don't love someone for their looks, or their clothes, or for their fancy car, but because they sing a song only you can hear.
Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes.quote: In all the world, there is no heart for me like yours. In all the world, there is no love for you like mine.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Quotes.quote: Love is an untamed force. When we try to control it, it destroys us. When we try to imprison it, it enslaves us. When we try to understand it, it leaves us feeling lost and confused.
Quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

Quotes.quote: I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.
Quotes.author: Angelita Lim

Quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
Quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

Quotes.quote: Love does not consist in gazing at each other, but in looking outward together in the same direction.
Quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

Quotes.quote: I would rather spend one lifetime with you, than face all the ages of this world alone.
Quotes.author: J.R.R. Tolkien

Quotes.quote: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved; loved for ourselves, or rather, loved in spite of ourselves.
Quotes.author: Victor Hugo

Quotes.quote: You make me want to be a better man.
Quotes.author: Melvin Udall

Quotes.quote: To love or have loved, that is enough. Ask nothing further. There is no other pearl to be found in the dark folds of life.
Quotes.author: Victor Hugo

Quotes.quote: If I had a flower for every time I thought of you... I could walk through my garden forever.
Quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

Quotes.quote: You are my today and all of my tomorrows.
Quotes.author: Leo Christopher

Quotes.quote: When I saw you I fell in love, and you smiled because you knew.
Quotes.author: Arrigo Boito

Quotes.quote: There is always some madness in love. But there is also always some reason in madness.
Quotes.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

Quotes.quote: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
Quotes.author: Aristotle

Quotes.quote: Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.
Quotes.author: Emily Brontë

Quotes.quote: If I know what love is, it is because of you.
Quotes.author: Hermann Hesse

Quotes.quote: I've tried so many times to think of a new way to say it, and it's still I love you.
Quotes.author: Zelda Fitzgerald

Quotes.quote: I love you more than there are stars in the sky and fish in the sea.
Quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.quote: If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day, so I never have to live without you.
Quotes.author: A.A. Milne

Quotes.quote: You are the finest, loveliest, tenderest, and most beautiful person I have ever known—and even that is an understatement.
Quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quotes.quote: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
Quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.quote: I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had.
Quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.quote: It's a very dangerous state. You are inclined to recklessness and kind of tune out the rest of your life and everything that's been important to you.
Quotes.author: Cormac McCarthy

Quotes.quote: Take my hand, take my whole life too. For I can't help falling in love with you.
Quotes.author: Elvis Presley

Quotes.quote: To be your friend was all I ever wanted; to be your lover was all I ever dreamed.
Quotes.author: Valerie Lombardo

Quotes.quote: You are the last thought in my mind before I drift off to sleep and the first thought when I wake up each morning.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: I love you, not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you.
Quotes.author: Roy Croft

Quotes.quote: Thinking of you keeps me awake. Dreaming of you keeps me asleep. Being with you keeps me alive.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: I need you like a heart needs a beat.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: If you remember me, then I don't care if everyone else forgets.
Quotes.author: Haruki Murakami

Quotes.quote: To love is nothing. To be loved is something. But to love and be loved, that's everything.
Quotes.author: T. Tolis

Quotes.quote: My love for you is past the mind, beyond my heart, and into my soul.
Quotes.author: Boris Kodjoe

Quotes.quote: Love is a force more formidable than any other. It is invisible—it cannot be seen or measured, yet it is powerful enough to transform you in a moment, and offer you more joy than any material possession could.
Quotes.author: Barbara de Angelis

Quotes.quote: My heart is, and always will be, yours.
Quotes.author: Jane Austen

Quotes.quote: Each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
Quotes.author: Rosemonde Gérard

Quotes.quote: And remember, as it was written, to love another person is to see the face of God.
Quotes.author: Victor Hugo

Quotes.quote: I love you as certain dark things are to be loved, in secret, between the shadow and the soul.
Quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

Quotes.quote: Love is the magician that pulls man out of his own hat.
Quotes.author: Ben Hecht

Quotes.quote: You're always the first and the last thing on this heart of mine. No matter where I go, or what I do, I'm thinking of you.
Quotes.author: Dierks Bentley

Quotes.quote: There is my heart, and then there is you, and I'm not sure there is a difference.
Quotes.author: A.R. Asher

Quotes.quote: I love you because the entire universe conspired to help me find you.
Quotes.author: Paulo Coelho

Quotes.quote: Love recognizes no barriers. It jumps hurdles, leaps fences, penetrates walls to arrive at its destination full of hope.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou

Quotes.quote: I swear I couldn't love you more than I do right now, and yet I know I will tomorrow.
Quotes.author: Leo Christopher

Quotes.quote: A simple 'I love you' means more than money.
Quotes.author: Frank Sinatra

Quotes.quote: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
Quotes.author: Eden Ahbez

Quotes.quote: To me, you are perfect.
Quotes.author: Love Actually

Quotes.quote: If you are lucky enough to find a weirdo, never let them go.
Quotes.author: Matthew Gray Gubler

Quotes.quote: I've never had a moment's doubt. I love you. I believe in you completely. You are my dearest one. My reason for life.
Quotes.author: Ian McEwan

Quotes.quote: When you realize you want to spend the rest of your life with somebody, you want the rest of your life to start as soon as possible.
Quotes.author: When Harry Met Sally

Quotes.quote: I am in you and you in me, mutual in divine love.
Quotes.author: William Blake

Quotes.quote: We loved with a love that was more than love.
Quotes.author: Edgar Allan Poe

Quotes.quote: Love is a game that two can play and both win.
Quotes.author: Eva Gabor

Quotes.quote: The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.
Quotes.author: Charles de Leusse

Quotes.quote: I love you more than I have ever found a way to say to you.
Quotes.author: Ben Folds

Quotes.quote: Love is the emblem of eternity; it confounds all notion of time; effaces all memory of a beginning, all fear of an end.
Quotes.author: Madame de Staël

Quotes.quote: I've never been so scared of losing something in my entire life. Then again, I've never loved something so much.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: Sometimes I look at you and I wonder how I got to be so damn lucky.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: I love thee to the depth and breadth and height my soul can reach.
Quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

Quotes.quote: You're the closest to heaven, that I'll ever be.
Quotes.author: Goo Goo Dolls

Quotes.quote: There is never a time or place for true love. It happens accidentally, in a heartbeat, in a single flashing, throbbing moment.
Quotes.author: Sarah Dessen

Quotes.quote: I could start fires with what I feel for you.
Quotes.author: David Ramirez

Quotes.quote: The minute I heard my first love story, I started looking for you, not knowing how blind that was. Lovers don't finally meet somewhere. They're in each other all along.
Quotes.author: Rumi

Quotes.quote: I want all of you, forever, you and me, every day.
Quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.quote: Come live in my heart and pay no rent.
Quotes.author: Samuel Lover

Quotes.quote: When I fall in love, it will be forever.
Quotes.author: Jane Austen

Quotes.quote: Your hand touching mine. This is how galaxies collide.
Quotes.author: Sanober Khan

Quotes.quote: I did not know what love was until I met you.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: Love's gift cannot be given, it waits to be accepted.
Quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

Quotes.quote: Love is the bridge between two hearts.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: I seem to have loved you in numberless forms, numberless times, in life after life, in age after age forever.
Quotes.author: Rabindranath Tagore

Quotes.quote: It was love at first sight, at last sight, at ever and ever sight.
Quotes.author: Vladimir Nabokov

Quotes.quote: If I were to live a thousand years, I would belong to you for all of them. If we were to live a thousand lives, I would want to make you mine in each one.
Quotes.author: Michelle Hodkin

Quotes.quote: Love is a promise, love is a souvenir, once given never forgotten, never let it disappear.
Quotes.author: John Lennon

Quotes.quote: A flower cannot blossom without sunshine, and man cannot live without love.
Quotes.author: Max Muller

Quotes.quote: For thousands of nights I dreamed of making love to you. No man on earth has ever hated sunrise as I do.
Quotes.author: Lisa Kleypas

Quotes.quote: I love you. I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I've ever had.
Quotes.author: The Notebook

Quotes.quote: If I had to dream up the perfect woman, she wouldn't even come close to you.
Quotes.author: Boy Meets World

Quotes.quote: To be fully seen by somebody, then, and be loved anyhow—this is a human offering that can border on miraculous.
Quotes.author: Elizabeth Gilbert

Quotes.quote: Two hearts in love need no words.
Quotes.author: Marceline Desbordes-Valmore

Quotes.quote: One word frees us of all the weight and pain of life: That word is love.
Quotes.author: Sophocles

Quotes.quote: I'd rather die tomorrow than live a hundred years without knowing you.
Quotes.author: Pocahontas

Quotes.quote: I don't need paradise because I found you. I don't need dreams because I already have you.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
Quotes.author: Audrey Hepburn

Quotes.quote: Life is the flower for which love is the honey.
Quotes.author: Victor Hugo

Quotes.quote: In your smile, I see something more beautiful than the stars.
Quotes.author: Beth Revis

Quotes.quote: You are my heart, my life, my one and only thought.
Quotes.author: Arthur Conan Doyle

Quotes.quote: For you see, each day I love you more, today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.
Quotes.author: Rosemonde Gérard

Quotes.quote: The meeting of two personalities is like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
Quotes.author: Carl Jung

Quotes.quote: Soul meets soul on lovers' lips.
Quotes.author: Percy Bysshe Shelley

Quotes.quote: True love stories never have endings.
Quotes.author: Richard Bach

Quotes.quote: When you love someone, you love the whole person, just as he or she is, and not as you would like them to be.
Quotes.author: Leo Tolstoy

Quotes.quote: There is only one happiness in this life, to love and be loved.
Quotes.author: George Sand

Quotes.quote: I would find you in any lifetime.
Quotes.author: Kanye West

Quotes.quote: I love you as the plant that never blooms but carries in itself the light of hidden flowers.
Quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

Quotes.quote: It is better to have loved and lost than never to have loved at all.
Quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

Quotes.quote: And in her smile I see something more beautiful than the stars.
Quotes.author: Beth Revis

Quotes.quote: You're nothing short of my everything.
Quotes.author: Ralph Block

Quotes.quote: Love was made for me and you.
Quotes.author: Nat King Cole

Quotes.quote: If you were a movie, I'd watch you over and over again.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: The giving of love is an education in itself.
Quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

Quotes.quote: There are all kinds of love in this world but never the same love twice.
Quotes.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

Quotes.quote: I still haven't figured out how to sit across from you, and not be madly in love with everything you do.
Quotes.author: William C. Hannan

Quotes.quote: True love is rare, and it's the only thing that gives life real meaning.
Quotes.author: Nicholas Sparks

Quotes.quote: When I'm with you, eternity is a step away, my love continues to grow, with each passing day.
Quotes.author: Julie Hebert

Quotes.quote: Because of you, I can feel myself slowly, but surely, becoming the me I have always dreamed of being.
Quotes.author: Tyler Knott Gregson

Quotes.quote: I have died everyday waiting for you. Darling, don't be afraid, I have loved you for a thousand years.
Quotes.author: Christina Perri

Quotes.quote: I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once.
Quotes.author: John Green

Quotes.quote: I knew the second I met you that there was something about you I needed. Turns out it wasn't something about you at all. It was just you.
Quotes.author: Jamie McGuire

Quotes.quote: And don't forget I'm also just a girl, standing in front of a boy, asking him to love her.
Quotes.author: Notting Hill

Quotes.quote: I love you. I knew it the minute I met you. I'm sorry it took so long for me to catch up.
Quotes.author: Silver Linings Playbook

Quotes.quote: Love is so short, forgetting is so long.
Quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

Quotes.quote: I wonder if I could ever be allowed to love you the way I want to.
Quotes.author: Carol

Quotes.quote: Distance means so little when someone means so much.
Quotes.author: Tom McNeal

Quotes.quote: My love for you is a journey, starting at forever and ending at never.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: Love is what you've been through with somebody.
Quotes.author: James Thurber

Quotes.quote: To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance.
Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes.quote: Love is a canvas furnished by nature and embroidered by imagination.
Quotes.author: Voltaire

Quotes.quote: I have found that if you love life, life will love you back.
Quotes.author: Arthur Rubinstein

Quotes.quote: The heart has its reasons which reason knows not.
Quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

Quotes.quote: The chance to love and be loved exists no matter where you are.
Quotes.author: Oprah Winfrey

Quotes.quote: When the power of love overcomes the love of power, the world will know peace.
Quotes.author: Jimi Hendrix

Quotes.quote: At the touch of love everyone becomes a poet.
Quotes.author: Plato

Quotes.quote: Love is something sent from heaven to worry the hell out of you.
Quotes.author: Dolly Parton

Quotes.quote: I love being married. It's so great to find one special person you want to annoy for the rest of your life.
Quotes.author: Rita Rudner

Quotes.quote: They say a person needs just three things to be truly happy in this world: someone to love, something to do, and something to hope for.
Quotes.author: Tom Bodett

Quotes.quote: Every heart sings a song, incomplete, until another heart whispers back.
Quotes.author: Plato

Quotes.quote: I love you not only for what you are, but for what I am when I am with you. I love you not only for what you have made of yourself, but for what you are making of me.
Quotes.author: Elizabeth Barrett Browning

Quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

Quotes.quote: Love is like war: easy to begin but very hard to stop.
Quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

Quotes.quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
Quotes.author: Lao Tzu

Quotes.quote: Age does not protect you from love, but love to some extent protects you from age.
Quotes.author: Jeanne Moreau

Quotes.quote: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
Quotes.author: Oliver Wendell Holmes

Quotes.quote: Love is the only gold.
Quotes.author: Alfred Lord Tennyson

Quotes.quote: Love is the beauty of the soul.
Quotes.author: Saint Augustine

Quotes.quote: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea.
Quotes.author: Honoré de Balzac

Quotes.quote: The real lover is the man who can thrill you by kissing your forehead or smiling into your eyes or just staring into space.
Quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

Quotes.quote: There is no remedy for love but to love more.
Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes.quote: To fear love is to fear life, and those who fear life are already three parts dead.
Quotes.author: Bertrand Russell

Quotes.quote: Love is an endless act of forgiveness.
Quotes.author: Jean Vanier

Quotes.quote: If equal affection cannot be, let the more loving be me.
Quotes.author: W. H. Auden

Quotes.quote: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
Quotes.author: Mignon McLaughlin

Quotes.quote: I'm selfish, impatient and a little insecure. I make mistakes, I am out of control and at times hard to handle. But if you can't handle me at my worst, then you sure as hell don't deserve me at my best.
Quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

Quotes.quote: Love is the triumph of imagination over intelligence.
Quotes.author: H. L. Mencken

Quotes.quote: Love is the greatest refreshment in life.
Quotes.author: Pablo Picasso

Quotes.quote: Love is the flower you've got to let grow.
Quotes.author: John Lennon

Quotes.quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
Quotes.author: Stephen Chbosky

Quotes.quote: Where there is love there is life.
Quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

Quotes.quote: You don't marry someone you can live with, you marry the person you cannot live without.
Quotes.author: Unknown

Quotes.quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
Quotes.author: Joseph Campbell

Quotes.quote: Love is a smoke made with the fume of sighs.
Quotes.author: William Shakespeare

Quotes.quote: Love is or it ain't. Thin love ain't love at all.
Quotes.author: Toni Morrison

Quotes.quote: Life without love is like a tree without blossoms or fruit.
Quotes.author: Khalil Gibran

Quotes.quote: The love we give away is the only love we keep.
Quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

Quotes.quote: Loving is not just looking at each other, it's looking in the same direction.
Quotes.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

Quotes.quote: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt.
Quotes.author: Charles M. Schulz

Quotes.quote: The heart wants what it wants. There's no logic to these things. You meet someone and you fall in love and that's that.
Quotes.author: Woody Allen

Quotes.quote: The art of love is largely the art of persistence.
Quotes.author: Albert Ellis

Quotes.quote: You know it's love when all you want is that person to be happy, even if you're not part of their happiness.
Quotes.author: Julia Roberts

Quotes.quote: Love doesn't make the world go round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
Quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

Quotes.quote: There's something about your soul that calms my rebellious spirit.
Quotes.author: Nikki Rowe

Quotes.quote: The most important thing in life is to learn how to give out love, and to let it come in.
Quotes.author: Morrie Schwartz

Quotes.quote: Love, having no geography, knows no boundaries.
Quotes.author: Truman Capote

Quotes.quote: Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.
Quotes.author: Robert A. Heinlein

Quotes.quote: The way to love anything is to realize that it may be lost.
Quotes.author: Gilbert K. Chesterton

Quotes.quote: You know you're in love when you can't fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.
Quotes.author: Dr. Seuss

Quotes.quote: If you judge people, you have no time to love them.
Quotes.author: Mother Teresa

Quotes.quote: Love yourself first and everything else falls into line.
Quotes.author: Lucille Ball

Quotes.quote: You can't blame gravity for falling in love.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.quote: Love is a better teacher than duty.
Quotes.author: Albert Einstein

Quotes.quote: A loving heart is the truest wisdom.
Quotes.author: Charles Dickens

Quotes.quote: Love is the joy of the good, the wonder of the wise, the amazement of the Gods.
Quotes.author: Plato

Quotes.quote: Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
Quotes.author: Franklin P. Jones

Quotes.quote: We are most alive when we're in love.
Quotes.author: John Updike

Quotes.quote: First love is only a little foolishness and a lot of curiosity.
Quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw

Quotes.quote: The love that lasts the longest is the love that is never returned.
Quotes.author: William Somerset Maugham

Quotes.quote: Absence diminishes small loves and increases great ones, as the wind blows out the candle and fans the bonfire.
Quotes.author: François de La Rochefoucauld

Quotes.quote: What we have once enjoyed we can never lose. All that we love deeply becomes a part of us.
Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Quotes.quote: Love is like a beautiful flower which I may not touch, but whose fragrance makes the garden a place of delight just the same.
Quotes.author: Helen Keller

Quotes.quote: Love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is done well.
Quotes.author: Vincent van Gogh

Quotes.quote: For small creatures such as we, the vastness is bearable only through love.
Quotes.author: Carl Sagan

Quotes.quote: Let us always meet each other with smile, for the smile is the beginning of love.
Quotes.author: Mother Teresa

Quotes.quote: Who, being loved, is poor?
Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes.quote: Life is the first gift, love is the second, and understanding the third.
Quotes.author: Marge Piercy

Quotes.quote: A kiss is a lovely trick designed by nature to stop speech when words become superfluous.
Quotes.author: Ingrid Bergman

Quotes.quote: Love is so short, forgetting is so long.
Quotes.author: Pablo Neruda

Quotes.quote: Love must be as much a light as it is a flame.
Quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau

Quotes.quote: Love is the greatest power and the highest end.
Quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

Quotes.quote: People who are sensible about love are incapable of it.
Quotes.author: Douglas Yates

Quotes.quote: Keep love in your heart. A life without it is like a sunless garden when the flowers are dead.
Quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

Quotes.quote: Have enough courage to trust love one more time and always one more time.
Quotes.author: Maya Angelou
